item.title: [debug][java]Remote debug in Eclipse
item.description: I need use remote debug in our project, however just some experience in Weblogic were found from internet. After my investigation, I got some experience about using Eclipse remote debug RCP. There are two important parameters for jvm. And we must launch remote java app with those two parameters. -Xdebug //tells jvm starting with debug mode -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=1044 //transport=dt_socket represents communication with socket, address=1044 represents that the port number is 1044
